subtitle: hi welcome to meaningful Mondays where
we answer your personal questions the
question for this week is about cynicism
how does one overcome daily cynicism and
encourage those close to them to do the
same on facing life's adversities how do
we make hope and optimism a new habit
when cynicism has taken its roots well
even the most cynical person on earth
has areas in their lives that they take
seriously this could be your children it
can be your value system it can be your
spiritual search it could be the areas
in your life that are very personal
sometimes even painful cynicism could
also be a mask that simply glosses over
one's inner suffering when inner angst
so the critical component in fighting
cynicism is not to go to war with the
things you're cynical about but rather
to find and uncover those areas in your
life that are important to you
practically identify three areas in life
that you consider to be a priority it
can be personal it can be family related
it can be work related to be your
passion and find specific exercises
things that you actually do that you
commit to on a daily basis to expand
upon and to implement to do something
about those areas that you take
seriously that's the best way a little
light dispels a lot of darkness and when
you have that type of focus that's the
best way to battle this cancer the
cynical cancer which comes with so much
complacency and can create certain with
lethargy and instead have a life that is
driven by passion cause and focus thank
you for watching please tune in next
week for meaningful Monday's if you'd
like to submit a question please click
on the link below if you've enjoyed this
please share and like
have a very pleasant week
